name: Talking Dragon!
description:
*** Talking Dragon free talking app is here!! Pet, poke, slap or tickle this virtual pet and become best talking friends! Talking cat is fun, but talking dragon is funnier! ***


If you think cats, dogs and parrots are the only one who can talk, think again, because here comes a super funny game - Talking Dragon!

The Dragon named Draco is your pet animal that responds to your touch and repeats everything you say with a funny voice. Pet your little dragon, poke him or tickle him, and you and he will become best talking friends.

Enjoy life-like emotions: Draco can be happy, angry, sad, bored... his emotions change according to how you play with him.


*** HOW TO PLAY ***

+ Talk to Draco and he will repeat everything you say in a funny and hilarious voice
+ Press his stomach to make him fart, sneeze or belch
+ Tickle his belly
+ Poke or slap Draco's face and feet and see how he looks like when he's angry
+ Swipe up-down to make him flap his wings, launch him high above the sky or stretch him :)
+ Swipe left-right and see a spinning Draco the Dragon
+ Plus, he likes wagging his tail, yawning, and doing a lot other funny and exciting things together with you
+ Dragon is a great game for girls and for boys
+ Record videos and share them on YouTube, Facebook or send them to your friends and family by email or MMS


Draco is waiting for you!! Bother him long enough and make him do different things. Record him and share the experience with your family and friends. Start your own dragon story and enjoy this magic dragon!!
